quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: When your mind is telling you you're done, you're really only 40% done
author: David Goggins

quote: When your mind is telling you you're done, you're really only 40% done
author: David Goggins

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality
author: Les Brown

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been
author: George Eliot

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it
author: Walt Disney

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life
author: Winston Churchill

quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Everything you can imagine is real
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The road of life is so hard but once you arrive at the top the view is amazing
author: Oscar Romero

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success is going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm
author: Winston Churchill
